text: There is a man in thy kingdom, in whom is the spirit of the holy gods; and in the days of thy father light and understanding and wisdom, like the wisdom of the gods, were found in him; and the king Nebuchadnezzar thy father, the king, <FI>I say<Fi> , thy father, made him master of the magicians, enchanters, Chaldeans, and soothsayers;
name: Daniel 5:11
